content: **knitted jacket in 4 strands drops kid-silk the piece is worked top down with raglan stripes and i-cord sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ks-216 yarn group e or a + a + a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 75-100-100-100-125-125 g colour 42 almond 75-75-75-75-100-100 g colour 01 off white 50-50-50-50-50-75 g colour 54 bright sand 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 56 marzipan if you want to work the jacket in one colour you will need 225-250-275-300-325-350 g **needles** drops circular needles size 7 mm length 80 cm drops circular needles size 5 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 7 mm drops double pointed needles size 5 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **buttons** drops buttons no 521 5-5-5-6-6-6 items **knitting gauge ** 12 stitches in width and 16 row in height with stocking stitch and 4 strands = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
